name: higgsboson
description: In the world of subatomic particles, this is the God particle.
author: Thomas Leon Highbaugh <admin@thomasleonhighbuagh.me>

scripts.build: sass --no-source-map src/higgsBosonChrome.scss userChrome.css && sass --no-source-map src/higgsBosonContent.scss userContent.css && prettier --write userChrome.css userContent.css
